label: OpenSea Event Trigger
name: openSeaEventTrigger
description: Start workflow whenever OpenSea event occurs

options.label: Sell to the highest bidder
options.name: english
options.description: The highest bid wins at the end

options.label: Sell with a declining price
options.name: dutch
options.description: The price falls until someone purchases the item

actions.label: Environment
actions.name: environment
actions.description: Environment to listen to event: Test or Main

inputParameters.label: Listen From
inputParameters.name: listenFrom
inputParameters.description: Listen event from a NFT or collection

inputParameters.label: Asset Contract Address
inputParameters.name: asset_contract_address
inputParameters.description: The NFT contract address for the assets for which to show events

inputParameters.label: Collection Slug
inputParameters.name: collection_slug
inputParameters.description: Events from a collection. For instance: if a collection url is: https://opensea.io/collection/my-collection-1, collection slug is my-collection-1.

inputParameters.label: Account Address
inputParameters.name: account_address
inputParameters.description: A user account's wallet address to filter for events on an account

inputParameters.label: Only Opensea
inputParameters.name: only_opensea
inputParameters.description: Restrict to events on OpenSea auctions

inputParameters.label: Polling Time
inputParameters.name: pollTime
inputParameters.description: How often should we keep checking the event
